description: Wearing a camo uniform with a kevlar vest, this person was a militia member turned feral.  Their hands grip a light machine gun as bloodshot eyes scan around; a headlamp above them illuminating their surroundings.
//: Armor value matches that of kevlar vest.

special_attacks.description: The feral militia fires their machine gun!

description: Wearing a camo uniform with a kevlar vest, this person was a militia member turned feral.  Their hands grip a semi-auto shotgun as bloodshot eyes scan around; a headlamp above them illuminating their surroundings.

special_attacks.description: The feral militia fires their shotgun!

description: A zombie that is not initially hostile and is always found in a dormant sitting or slow walking state.  However, if startled or attacked, she can instantly incapacitate, or even kill you.
A human body now swollen to the size of six men, with arms as wide as a trash can.  One hand holding a boom box like a rocket launcher, other hand swinging like it's enjoying the beat.
No one knows what made this crocodile-like beast.  Two things are certain; that it's huge, and it's going to tear whatever is apart.
A rock the size of a baseball.  Makes a decent melee weapon, and is also good for throwing at enemies.
Their pupils are dilated and what remains to be seen of the iris and sclera are bloodshot.  This weapon-wielding maniac still breathes, but the zombies treat them like one of their own.

special_attacks.description: The feral human throws a rock!

name: Backup call
description: Summons several permanent feral students.

Their pupils are dilated and what remains to be seen of the iris and sclera are bloodshot.  This light baton-wielding maniac still breathes, but the zombies treat them like one of their own.  For some reason, these ferals can call more of his friends.

special_attacks.description: The feral hall monitor launches a hail of BBs!

name: Calling people
description: Summons several zombies.
This zombie wears a tattered straitjacket.  For some reason, these zombies can shout to call more of his friends.

name: Calling for backup
description: Summons several zombie soldiers.
Once a soldier, it is dressed head to toe in combat gear and carries itself rather steadily for a zombie.  For some reason, these zombies can shout to call more of his squad members.

Their pupils are dilated and what remains to be seen of the iris and sclera are bloodshot.  This flamethrower-wielding, nomex-armored, and fuel-tank wearnig maniac still breathes, but the zombies treat them like one of their own.  From the looks of the fuel tank, you absolutely don't want to kill it near you...

name: Healing dart discharge
description: Heal dart go pew pew.

name: Healing dart discharge
description: Heal dart go pew pew.

A doctor staggers forward, their bloodshot eyes flickering with the last traces of human awareness.  Torn between instinct and intellect, they clutch a rusted scalpel, as if desperately clinging to their former purpose.  Fortunately, the healing activity of the doctor does not care if the patient is this feral's enemy or not.

special_attacks.monster_message: The feral doctor heals one of your enemies!

description: A supply drop box.
//: Zombie faction so they don't attack a clear prop
//2: It gives you stuff. Copied from that red dragon.

description: The lives of underwater were no exception from the cataclysm.  Eventually some swordfish got affected, and rose again.  Now that climbed up the river like a salmon, and ready to chop down anything in their way.  En garde!

name: Healing dart discharge
description: Heal dart go pew pew.

name: Healing dart discharge
description: Heal dart go pew pew.
This creates the effect that heals the user and the ones nearby.

name: heal drone
description: An automated anti-personnel drone, a small quadcopter robot surrounded by whirring blades and an improvised firearm.

special_attacks.description: Heal drone launches a hail of BBs!

description: Fake gun for a Heal Drone.

name: ENZ
description: An automated anti-personnel drone, a small quadcopter robot surrounded by whirring blades.

special_attacks.description: Enz launches a hail of BBs!

description: Fake gun for Enz manhack.

name: attack drone
description: An automated anti-personnel drone, a small quadcopter robot surrounded by whirring blades and an improvised firearm.

special_attacks.description: Attack drone launches a hail of BBs!

description: Fake gun for an Attack Drone.
The Eastern moose, the largest living species of deer.  While they aren't aggressive unless angered, the mating season can make the bulls quite ill-tempered.
//: Baby moose don't actually exist (yet), but autumn is their mating season so baby_flags is defined so that they get angry then

petfood.feed: The %s seems to like you! It lets you pat its head and seems friendly.

description: The Eastern cougar, a large feline predator.  Once thought extinct in this region, conservation efforts were successful in restoring a thriving population.  Fast and silent, this predator can cover long distances with powerful leaps and pounces, catching its prey with its deadly claws before delivering the finishing blow with its enormous fangs.
A towering, hulking dragon, with tremendous, curving horns and shining red scales, its glowing maw peeled back in a hateful grimace as its eyes bore into yours.
//: Zombie faction so they don't attack a clear prop

description: A cunning pack predator, once extinct in the New England area, the wolf was successfully reintroduced and their numbers reached record highs in the decade before the Cataclysm.  Lucky you.
A huge, humming machine with lots of gears and panels.  It emits some strange smoke, which does not look that healthy.
//: Zombie faction so they don't attack a clear prop

description: This student wears a suit, and looks pretty normal.  His face has no emotions, but a bit of anger is visible.
This student wears a suit, and looks pretty normal except one of his eyes is glowing red.
This student now has a black cloud, the shape of a giant, behind his back like that anime which includes stars and platinum.
This student now has a black cloud, the shape of a giant, releasing lots of black smoke.  Both the student and the smoke giant behind him has glowing red eyes now.
Wether due to blobs, or the rules of survival, wolves also mutated into these hideous creatures - black fur which hides them in the dark, ability to jump farther, and deadlier.

A grotesque and twisted zombie, capable of spreading a virulent plague that reanimates the dead into its servile horde.  With a body covered in festering sores and emitting a noxious, greenish fog, it commands swarms of infectious undead that follow its every command.
A decaying zombie that detonates violently when it nears its target.  Its explosion causes severe damage and attracts other zombies.

This specialized undead has enhanced vision and agility, often found perched on high vantage points.  Spotter Zombies alert hordes to survivors' locations by emitting piercing screams, making them a top priority for elimination.

The water turret employs high-pressure water jets to incapacitate intruders with precision and non-lethal force, making it an ideal defense for sensitive areas.  It provides 360-degree coverage and reliable protection in all weather conditions.
Fake gun that fires water.

The ice turret deploys powerful blasts of ice to immobilize threats, offering an effective and non-lethal means of defense.  Its advanced targeting system and full 360-degree rotation ensure comprehensive coverage and operational reliability in extreme weather conditions.
Fake gun that fires ice.
The LMG BB turret is an automated defense system offering rapid, yet precise fire support.  With a swiveling base and advanced targeting, it ensures robust perimeter protection.
Fake gun for an Attack Drone.
The BB sniper turret is an automated defense system offering simple, but precise fire support.  With a swiveling base and advanced targeting, it ensures robust perimeter protection.
Fake gun for an Attack Drone.
The acid turret is an automated defense system offering simple, but wide fire support.  With a swiveling base and wide range attacks, it ensures robust perimeter protection.
Fake gun that fires some sort of acid at very high speed by unknown means of propulsion.
The flame turret is an automated defense system offering simple, but wide fire support.  With a swiveling base and wide range attacks, it ensures robust perimeter protection.
Fake gun that fires some sort of flame at very high speed by unknown means of propulsion.
The electric turret is an automated defense system offering simple, but wide fire support.  With a swiveling base and wide range attacks, it ensures robust perimeter protection.
Fake gun that fires some sort of electricity at very high speed by unknown means of propulsion.
The rock thrower turret is an automated defense system offering slow but precise fire support.  With a swiveling base and advanced targeting, it ensures robust perimeter protection.
Fake gun for an Attack Drone.

The heal turret employs high-pressure heal jets to nearby friends with precision and non-lethal force, making it an ideal support for sensitive areas.  It provides 360-degree coverage and reliable protection in all weather conditions.

special_attacks.description: Heal turret launches a hail of BBs!

description: The chemical turret is an automated defense system offering simple, but wide fire support.  With a swiveling base and wide range attacks, it ensures robust perimeter protection.
Fake gun that fires some sort of chemical at very high speed by unknown means of propulsion.
Fake gun that fires some sort of flame at very high speed by unknown means of propulsion.
Yes, it's a dinosaur.  And no, no one knows how this works.

special_attacks.description: The fire dinosaur shoots fire from it's mouth!

description: Fake gun that fires some sort of acid at very high speed by unknown means of propulsion.
Yes, it's a dinosaur.  And no, no one knows how this works.

special_attacks.description: The acid dinosaur launches a spray of acid!

description: A giant plant with a thick stalk adorned by a purple flower with huge rows of teeth.  Its petals are open with ominous shine in center.
A large bird of prey with a powerful hooked beak and sharp talons.  Eagles are known for their keen eyesight and majestic flight, often soaring high above in search of prey.

petfood.feed: The %s seems to like you!  It flies around you and seems friendly.

description: Modified G36 with internal magazine.  Good for machines.
A PANTHEON unmanned ground robot equipped with a H&K G36.  It is an android with an array of motors and sensors covering its weapon mount.

This is an inactive V10 PANTHEON SHELL equipped with a  H&K G36.  Using this item involves loading the unit with the factory-loaded 5.56x45mm rounds in your inventory (if you wish to divide your ammunition, set aside whatever 5.56x45mm you do NOT want to give the robot) turning it on, and placing it on the ground.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the security bot will then identify you as a friendly, roam around or follow you, and attack all enemies with its rifle.

use_action.friendly_msg: The security bot beeps affirmatively and begins scanning for hostiles.
use_action.hostile_msg: You misprogram the security bot and it trains its gun on you. RUN!

description: A broken V10, with its casing broken and fluid drained.  Could be gutted for parts.
An image made from light, nearly identical to the real deal.
This is an inactive hologram deployer.  Electronics and computer skill determines if the targeting matrix is reprogrammed successfully.

use_action.friendly_msg: The hologram flies from your hand and surveys the area!
use_action.hostile_msg: You misprogram the hologram; it's hostile!

description: With a stinger the size of a kitchen knife, this dog-sized insect's black and yellow markings warn you to leave it undisturbed.

This is an inactive police robot.  Using this item involves placing it on the ground and turning it on.  If reprogrammed and rewired successfully the remote vehicle will then identify you as law enforcement, roam around or follow you, and attempt to detain lawbreakers.

use_action.friendly_msg: The remote vehicle rolls into action ready to pursue.
use_action.hostile_msg: A siren howls and lights flash as the remote vehicle looks at you weird!

description: A broken remote vehicle.  Much less threatening now that it's quiet and still.  Could be gutted for parts.

One of the many models of armored law enforcement robots employed shortly before the collapse of civilization.  Solar powered like many other robots, it maintains its programmed pursuit of law and order, propelled on a trio of omni wheels.
